full_summary:
_____________________
### Government Tender Announcement

### Title
M7594-241370 - Architectural and Engineering Services

### Reference Number
WS4318688527-Doc4318700611

### Amendment Number
4

### Competition Number
WS4318688527

### Publication Date
December 19, 2023

### Closing Date
January 31, 2024, at 02:00 PM (EDT)

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Description of Service
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) seeks a service provider to provide architectural and engineering services for pre-design, design, construction, and other technical services for various construction and maintenance projects in the Nunavut Territory. The services required include:

* Pre-design services
* Design services
* Construction services
* Other technical services

### Requirements
The service provider must have expertise in architectural and engineering services, specifically in building design and construction.

### Conditions of Participation
* The service provider must be registered in Ariba Discovery.
* All bids must be submitted in English or French.
* The bid must be received by the closing date and time.
* The bid must be signed by a duly authorized official of the service provider.

### Evaluation Criteria
The award will be based on the highest combined rating of the service provider's technical merit and price.

### Contact Information
Contact information can be found on the Ariba Discovery website.

### File Attachments
No file attachments are required.

### Language
The solicitation is in English, and French translations are also available.
